name: Tanks!(demo)
description:
Short demo for a computer version of the old "Tanks!" minigame on Wii Play. Although this game is extremely similar to the original game, it is just a demo and new and far more original additions will be in the full version once it is done.

Controls: Left click to shoot, right click to lay mine, WASD to move, and use mouse to aim.

Current Known Bugs: Collision with shells and corners of walls is a bit buggy but not game breaking. Killing the last tank and yourself at the same time (ie. with a mine) causes current mission to increment but still makes you replay the mission.
